thing-type.label: ZMote ZMT2
thing-type.description: ZMote is a IR transmitter that connects to your home WiFi network and let's you control all your IR enabled devices, like e.g. TVs, Blu-ray players, air conditioners and may more.

parameter.name: configFile
parameter.label: Configuration File
parameter.description: The path to the configuration file for the remote.

parameter.name: uuid
parameter.label: UUID
parameter.description: The unique ID of the ZMote device.

parameter.name: url
parameter.label: Device URL
parameter.description: The URL of the ZMote if auto-discovery should not be used.

parameter.name: retry
parameter.label: Retry
parameter.description: How often sending an IR code is retried until we give up.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout until we give up connecting to the device.

channel-type.label: Online
channel-type.description: States whether the ZMote is online or not.

channel-type.label: Code
channel-type.description: The IR code that should be sent by the device.

channel-type.label: Key
channel-type.description: The name of the button that should be sent by the device.
